Scheme 1: (a) Drugs with pyrazolone structures, (b) Electrochemical oxidative cross-coupling of pyrazolones and diselenides
Scheme 2: Substrate scope of pyrazolones and diselenides. [a] Reaction conditions:1(0.5 mmol),2(0.5 mmol),nBu4NBF4(0.5 mmol) in CH3CN (11 mL), graphite rod as the anode (φ 6 mm, about 15 mm immersion depth in solution) and platinum plate (15 mm×15 mm×0.3 mm) as the cathode, undivided cell, r.t., Ar, 21 mA, 6.5 h. [b] 21 mA, 6.5 h, MeOH. [c] 5 mA, 9.0 h
